definition: to display utter loyalty/to be loyal to the end
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
loyal/devoted/honest

sentences.english: Are you doing it faithfully and in the best possible away?
sentences.chinese: 你有否尽忠职守，全心全意地把工作做好？

sentences.english: John the Baptist was faithful, but he was beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 施洗约翰也尽忠，下场却是被斩首。

sentences.english: The United Nations lost some of its most dedicated staff on that day.
sentences.chinese: 那一天联合国失去了一些最尽忠职守的工作人员。

sentences.english: The brave soldiers did their duty, careless of dangers and discomforts .
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的士兵尽忠职守，对危险和困苦毫不在乎。

sentences.english: I shall be worthy of your allegiance.
sentences.chinese: 我应该值当你们的尽忠。

sentences.english: God listens as people rise within the congregation of believers to declare faith and allegiance to God.
sentences.chinese: 神听著会众中有人站起来，表示信靠及尽忠于神。

sentences.english: Many a man has lived and died for his country.
sentences.chinese: 好多人为国尽忠，为国捐躯。

sentences.english: They devote their lives to the motherland and vow to die rather than become a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 他们对国家效死尽忠，发誓决不当叛徒。

sentences.english: The people who serve in the military are giving their best to this country.
sentences.chinese: 我们的军人正为我国尽忠尽职。

sentences.english: Dedicated, hard working, trust your instincts and love of glory.
sentences.chinese: 尽忠职守，勤奋工作，并且热爱荣耀相信自己的直觉。

sentences.english: Ma'am, you must appreciate that I have my duty to perform…just as Your Royal Highness has her duty.
sentences.chinese: 殿下，你得体谅我要尽忠职守，正如公主也有其职责。

sentences.english: Who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.
sentences.chinese: 他为那设立他的尽忠，如同摩西在神的全家尽忠一样。

sentences.english: Who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.
sentences.chinese: 他为那设立他的尽忠，如同摩西在神的全家尽忠一样。

sentences.english: Serve the kaname madoka's today, tomorrow you may be dead.
sentences.chinese: 今日为你的小圆尽忠，因为也许明天你将死去。

definition: render service to repay kindness
faithful official
loyal and righteous/fealty/loyalty
good faith/devotion/loyalty/dedication
loyal and brave
to sacrifice one's life
to offer one's life in sacrifice
to vow loyalty and devotion to
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
to guard one's territory/to protect the country
official in feudal court/subject
faithful patriots (idiom)
loyal and devoted (idiom); faithful and true
to die in battle (idiom)
to bend to a task and spare no effort unto one's dying day (idiom); striving to the utmost one's whole life/with every breath in one's body, unto one's dying day
pinyin: ju1 gong1 jin4 cui4 , si3 er2 hou4 yi3

definition: righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
